ModMetaData.name: No Lightning Flash UwU
ModMetaData.author: Scurvyez
ModMetaData.description:
Discord: steveo.o steam: Scurvyez
Be gone flashes! Uwu
This mod does one simple thing. It allows you to toggle the visibility of those pesky map-wide, bright lightning flashes on the map.\n\nUse the mod settings. Uwu
